mapper.select: select count(device_code_id) from is_device where device_code_id = #{deviceCodeId}
select is_device.device_no,is_device.device_code_name,is_device_code.model,is_device_code.code from is_device, is_device_code where is_device.device_code_id = is_device_code.id and device_status='0'

select a.codeName,a.model,(case when b.counts is null then 0 else b.counts end) as counts from (select is_device.device_code_name as codeName,is_device_code.model as model,COUNT(device_code_name) as counts from is_device, is_device_code where is_device.device_code_id = is_device_code.id GROUP by is_device.device_code_name, is_device_code.model) a left join (select is_device.device_code_name as codeName,is_device_code.model as model,COUNT(device_code_name) as counts from is_device, is_device_code where is_device.device_code_id = is_device_code.id and is_device.device_status = '0' GROUP by is_device.device_code_name, is_device_code.model) b on a.codename = b.codename
